channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drivers Blocking Cycle Lane & Pavement, 1st November
item.description:
Often encounter drivers blocking pavement & cycle lane here. Zero enforcement in morning or after 7pm when cycle commuting home.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 765, Green Lanes, Edmonton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Frequent Roundabout Parking & Requirement For Bollard, 1st November
item.description:
People keep parking at the cycle storage in Winchmore Hill Green, blocking the roundabout and making it difficult to get bikes in and out of the pedestrian area. Also, one driver keeps parking in the gap between kerb & cycle storage at this location, fully blocking the cycle stand - would benefit with a bollard here as these drivers will just keep being opportunistic.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Stuffed dumped opposite 55 Lion road, 1st November
item.description:
A board and box dumped by lampost opposite 55 lion road Bexleyheath. Also street cleaning required between the junction of Standard road and Lion road and Bexleyheath broadway. This section of the road, particularly the west side (the Salvation Army building side) has not been cleaned properly for at least a month. There are plastic bottles and drinks cans amongst other rubbish in the gutter and on the pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 51, Lion Road, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet
